name: Operation Lama
description:
The Dalai Lama goes back in time to fight the evil people in history.

Level 1: Hitler a Game by Ross Byrne, Judith Hartmann, Alan Steward, Alessio Susi

Controls:

Player 1: Left = a, Right = d, Jump = w, shoot = q and e.

Player 2: Left = j, Right = l, Jump = i, Shoot = u and o.
